title: Kubernetes Extensibility
description: Learn techniques for extending Kubernetes beyond its default features and resources with plugins, CRDs and Operators.

courses.title: Custom Resource Definitions
courses.description: Extending Kubernetes with your own custom resources (CRDs).

courses.title: Kubectl CLI Plugins
courses.description: Extend Kubernetes with plugins added to the kubectl CLI tool.

courses.title: Kubectl CLI Plugin Development
courses.description: Extend Kubernetes with plugins added to the kubectl CLI tool.

courses.title: Develop an Operator with Kubebuilder
courses.description: Learn how to control custom resources with Kubebuilder based Operators.

courses.title: Develop an Operator with KUDO
courses.description: Learn how to control custom resources with KUDO based Operators.
